headBannerText.title: How can we help you?
headBannerText.contents: We will do our best to assist with issues related to the service.

FAQText.title: Check out frequently asked questions and answers.

LearnText.title: Learning Center
LearnText.contents: Guides you through tutorials, manuals, tips, and more.
LearnText.middletext: VIRNECT products make safer and more efficient industrial worksites by applying XR solutions and digital twin technologies.

supModule.title: We always welcome various inquiries from customers.
supModule.subtitle: Please contact any one of our experts with any questions.

contactBannerText.contents1: Are you looking for solutions or trying to advance your worksite?
contactBannerText.contents2: VIRNECT is prepared to solve the problem.
